products.body_html:
Ninja Foodi 11 in 1 SmartLid Multi Cooker 6L OL550UK

Revolutionize your cooking with the Ninja Foodi 11-in-1 SmartLid Multi-Cooker 6L OL550UK, designed to make meal preparation faster, easier, and healthier. Perfect for families or those who love hosting, this multi-cooker boasts a generous 6L capacity to serve up to 6 people, making it ideal for hearty meals in under 30 minutes.

SmartLid Technology: One Lid, Endless Possibilities

The Ninja OL550UK introduces a game-changing SmartLid, which allows you to switch seamlessly between Pressure Cook, Air Fry, and Combi-Steam modes. With just a slide of the lid, you unlock 11 versatile cooking functions that include:

  • Pressure Cook: Up to 70% faster than traditional methods.*
  • Air Fry: Achieve crispy results with up to 75% less fat than deep frying.**
  • Grill, Bake, and Dehydrate for endless cooking creativity.
  • Steam Air Fry and Steam Bake for moist, tender meals with a crispy finish.
  • Plus, Sear/Sauté, Slow Cook, Yoghurt, and more.

Combi-Steam Mode: Juicy, Crispy, and Fast

Unique to the Ninja Foodi OL550UK, the Combi-Steam Mode combines steam with convection heat to deliver meals that are moist inside and perfectly crisp outside. Use this mode for everything from succulent chicken with garlic potatoes to fluffy cakes and golden pastries.

Air Fry Mode: Healthier, Crispier Results

Enjoy guilt-free fried favorites with Air Fry Mode, using little to no oil. From golden fries to crispy chicken wings, the Ninja 11-in-1 delivers all the flavor and texture without the extra fat.

Pressure Cook Mode: Speed Meets Flavor

Pressure Cooking lets you prepare tender meats, stews, and more in a fraction of the time. Think juicy brisket, flavorful curries, and perfectly cooked pulled pork—all in under 30 minutes.

11 Cooking Functions for Every Meal

This all-in-one multi-cooker truly does it all:

  • Pressure Cook
  • Air Fry
  • Steam Air Fry
  • Steam Bake
  • Grill
  • Bake
  • Dehydrate
  • Slow Cook
  • Sear/Sauté
  • Steam
  • Yoghurt

Energy Efficient and Eco-Friendly

The Ninja Foodi OL550UK helps you save both time and money. With up to 65% energy savings†, you can cook smarter while reducing your bills.

Complete Accessories for Convenient Cooking

This Ninja 11-in-1 multi-cooker comes with:

  • 6L Non-Stick Cooking Pot: Perfect for a 2kg roast.
  • 3.7L Cook & Crisp Basket: Ideal for crispy fries, fitting up to 1.1kg.
  • Reversible Rack: Layer mains and sides or elevate food for even cooking.
    All accessories are dishwasher safe for hassle-free cleaning.

Recipes and Inspiration Included

Get started right away with the Ninja Foodi OL550UK recipe guide, featuring chef-created dishes and cooking charts to spark your creativity.

Why Choose Ninja Foodi OL550UK?

  • Quick family meals: Cook for up to 6 people in under 30 minutes.
  • Versatile cooking functions: From Pressure Cooking to Air Frying and beyond.
  • SmartLid convenience: One lid for multiple cooking modes.
  • Durable and easy to clean: Non-stick, dishwasher-safe accessories.

Upgrade your kitchen with the Ninja Foodi 11-in-1 SmartLid Multi-Cooker OL550UK, the ultimate appliance for quick, delicious, and healthy meals.

products.title: Ninja® Foodi® Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK
products.body_html:
Ninja AF300UK Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer

Discover the Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK, the ultimate solution for efficient, versatile, and healthy cooking. Whether you're preparing quick meals for the family or experimenting with new recipes, this powerful appliance delivers unmatched convenience with its innovative features. Designed for modern kitchens, the Ninja AF300UK Air Fryer ensures perfect results every time with its advanced technology and multi-functional cooking modes.

Cook 2 Foods, 2 Ways, and Finish Together

Say goodbye to juggling multiple cooking appliances. The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone AF300UK Air Fryer features 2 Independent Cooking Zones, allowing you to prepare two different dishes at different temperatures, times, and settings simultaneously. Thanks to the SYNC feature, both dishes are ready at the same time – no cold sides or unevenly cooked meals. Whether you're roasting chicken while air frying fries or baking salmon alongside crisp vegetables, this air fryer handles it all effortlessly.

More Than Just an Air Fryer

The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK offers 6 versatile cooking modes to expand your culinary possibilities:

  • Air Fry: Enjoy crispy results with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods, using little to no oil. Perfect for chicken wings, chips, fishcakes, and more.
  • Max Crisp: Cook frozen foods to golden perfection in minutes with temperatures up to 240°C. Ideal for scampi, onion rings, or French fries.
  • Roast: Elevate your meals with perfectly roasted meats, vegetables, and fish.
  • Bake: Prepare fresh bread, pasta bakes, muffins, and cakes effortlessly.
  • Dehydrate: Create healthy snacks like dried fruit, vegetable crisps, or homemade beef jerky.
  • Reheat: Bring leftovers back to life, restoring their fresh-out-of-the-oven flavor.

Match Settings for Bigger Portions

Hosting guests or feeding a large family? Use the MATCH feature to double your portions with the same cooking program and time across both drawers. From large batches of chips to party-ready snacks, the Ninja Foodi AF300UK has got you covered.

Perfect for Every Occasion

Whether you're cooking for one or catering to diverse dietary needs, this Ninja Air Fryer AF300UK is designed to adapt. Use one drawer for vegetarian meals and the other for meat dishes, ensuring everyone gets their preferred dish without cross-contamination.

Effortless Operation and Cleanup

The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK features an intuitive digital control panel with a countdown timer, making it easy to track cooking progress. Adjustable temperature controls let you customize your recipes, while the Auto-Adjust Fan optimizes cooking performance for every function. Cleaning up is a breeze with non-stick, dishwasher-safe 3.8L cooking drawers.

Why Choose the Ninja Foodi AF300UK?

  • Faster than fan ovens: Cook up to 75% faster.
  • Healthier meals: Air fry with significantly less fat.
  • Endless versatility: From snacks to main courses and desserts.
  • Chef-inspired recipes: Get started with a recipe guide included.

Elevate your cooking game with the Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK – your ultimate kitchen companion for healthier, quicker, and tastier meals. Whether it's crispy chicken, golden fries, or perfectly roasted vegetables, this Ninja for Kitchen innovation delivers every time. Perfect your mealtime routine with the best in class Ninja Foodi AF300UK.

Ninja® Air Fryer AF100UK

Ninja Air Fryer 3.8L AF100UK – A Healthier Way to Fry Your Favourite Foods

Discover the Ninja Air Fryer 3.8 Litre, the ultimate kitchen appliance that lets you enjoy your favourite fried foods with up to 75% less fat compared to traditional frying methods*. Whether you’re craving perfectly cooked chips, crispy chicken wings, roasted vegetables, or even homemade beef jerky, the Ninja Air Fryer AF100UK delivers the same great taste with little to no oil.

Why Choose the Ninja Air Fryer AF100UK?

  • Healthier Frying Made Easy: The Air Fry function circulates super-hot air evenly around your food for a deliciously crispy finish without the guilt. From golden fries to juicy burgers and marinated prawns, the possibilities are endless.
  • Versatile 4-in-1 Functionality: This is more than just an air fryer. With four cooking modes – Air Fry, Roast, Reheat, and Dehydrate – you can create mouthwatering mains and sides, restore leftover pizza to oven-fresh perfection, and even make homemade dried fruits and snacks.
  • Cook Up to 50% Faster: Compared to fan ovens**, the Ninja Air Fryer AF100UK reduces cooking time significantly, so dinner is ready in half the time. With customisable programmes, precise temperature control, and fast airflow, every meal is cooked to perfection.

Small Air Fryer, Big Results

The compact yet spacious 3.8L non-stick basket can handle up to 900g of fries, making it ideal for families. Designed with convenience in mind, the basket is dishwasher safe for quick and easy cleaning.

Perfect for Fresh and Frozen Foods

Cook from frozen without defrosting! From frozen chicken wings to vegetable crisps, enjoy crispy results without the hassle.

What Sets the Ninja Air Fryer 3.8L Apart?

  • Healthier Cooking: Up to 75% less fat* compared to traditional frying.
  • Faster Meals: Get food on the table quicker, saving time and energy.
  • Easy to Use: One-touch controls and variable heat settings make cooking effortless.
  • Durable Design: Backed by a 2-year guarantee upon registration with Ninja (UK & ROI).

Ready to Revolutionise Your Cooking?

Whether you’re meal prepping or creating delicious snacks, the Ninja Air Fryer 3.8L AF100UK is your go-to kitchen companion. With a chef-inspired recipe guide included, you’ll never run out of ideas.

Order your Ninja Air Fryer 3.8Litre today and transform the way you cook!

products.body_html:
Ninja Foodi MAX Dual Zone Air Fryer AF400UK 9.5L - Black

Discover the incredible versatility of the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer, featuring six cooking options and two convenient cooking drawers. With its generous capacity and innovative features, this air fryer will revolutionize your mealtimes.

Experience Convenient Cooking Prepare a wide range of delectable dishes with ease using the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer. From crispy fries and flavorful crisps to nutritious vegetables and mouthwatering beef jerky, this state-of-the-art appliance allows you to indulge in your favorite meals and sides. Best of all, it utilizes minimal oil, resulting in up to 75% less fat compared to traditional frying methods.

Unparalleled Cooking Flexibility Timing is crucial when it comes to cooking, and the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer has you covered. Equipped with two independent zones, you can effortlessly mix and match cooking programs, durations, and temperatures across both drawers. This enables you to create delicious meals in mere moments.

Double the Delight The Match feature of the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer lets you double your portion size. Simply cook the same food simultaneously in both drawers, using the same cooking program, to prepare twice the amount of mouthwatering goodness. Whether you're feeding the entire family or hosting guests for dinner, this feature ensures everyone is satisfied. Additionally, the appliance allows you to cook different foods using the same cooking instructions, providing unparalleled flexibility.

Explore a Multitude of Options The Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer goes beyond traditional air frying, offering five additional programs to cater to your culinary desires:

  1. Max Crisp
  2. Roast
  3. Bake
  4. Reheat
  5. Dehydrate

With its expansive 9.5 L capacity, each drawer accommodates up to 1.4 kg of fries or a 2 kg chicken, making it perfect for preparing family favorites any day of the week. Utilize the Max Crisp option to transform frozen ingredients into perfectly crisp and golden delights within minutes. Alternatively, experiment with the bake option to craft mouthwatering pasta dishes. From fluffy potatoes to irresistibly crispy crackling, the Roast option lets you create a variety of culinary masterpieces. The possibilities are endless!

Convenience and Accessories The Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer includes a range of practical accessories to enhance your cooking experience. Benefit from two large 4.5 L non-stick drawers and two non-stick crisper plates, providing ample space for your culinary creations. All accessories are dishwasher safe, making clean-up a breeze. Rest assured, the appliance is equipped with anti-slip feet to ensure stability and prevent accidents.

Upgrade your cooking repertoire with the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer and savor the convenience, versatility, and exceptional results it delivers. Embrace healthier cooking methods without compromising on taste and indulge in an array of delicious meals for yourself and your loved ones.

This revolutionary Ninja blender combines two appliances in one. With a powerful 1100W motor and Auto-iQ technology, the CB100UK will make you rethink what a blender can do.

Features
Textures tailored to your taste, from light and silky to thick and spreadable
4 Auto-iQ programs do the hard work for you: Blend, crush, mix and powermix
1100W motor, 400 ml Power Nutri Bowl & 700 ml Power Nutri Cup
Built in power paddle pushes ingredients towards the blade

Brilliant Variety
Texture is as important as taste when it comes to homemade creations, and the Ninja CB100UK will blend and crush your way to delicious treats in seconds.

Use the 400ml Power Nutri Bowl to create thick textures, from smoothie bowls and nut butters to pâté and frozen yogurt. Thanks to the built in power paddle, ingredients are pushed towards the blade so there’s no need to scrape or shake thick mixtures.

Blend in the 700ml Power Nutri Cup for silky-smooth drinks and dressings. Create smoothies and milkshakes using your favourite fresh and frozen ingredients or blend crushed-ice cocktails ready for those hot summer days. And, make light dips and dressings as well as finely crushed nuts, seeds, and ice to a super smooth finish – perfect for taking on-the-go.

Ninja Design
Some blenders can struggle with think mixtures and can stall or even stop mid-blend. Thanks to the 1100 W Smart Torque motor, the CB100UK powers through even the thickets of ingredients, so there’s no need to stir or shake your food. Designed for use with less liquid, the Smart Torque motor maintains a high speed to deliver uninterrupted power and performance.

The CB100UK also features Auto-IQ technology. Exclusive to Ninja, these intelligent programmes are tailored to deliver the perfect results at the touch of a button. Four unique pulse, pause and blend patterns do all the hard work for you. Choose from Blend, Crush, Mix and PowerMix for complete cooking flexibility.

Available in a sleek, stylish silver finish, this Ninja blender will look great in any kitchen. All parts are dishwasher safe, so cleaning up is easy, and the anti-slip feet stop the appliance from moving during use. Plus, there’s an inspiration guide included in the box to help you get started.

products.title: Ninja ST200UK 3-in-1 2 Slice Toaster - Grill and Panini Press - Black
products.body_html:
Ninja ST200UK 3-in-1 2 Slice Toaster - Grill and Panini Press - Stainless Steel

Versatile Breakfast

Make mornings delicious with the Ninja ST200UK. With a 3-in-1 appliance, you can make a huge range of tasty snacks for the whole family. Thanks to the two extra wide slots, you won’t be restricted by the thickness of the bread either. Whether you like rustic sourdough or thin pitta, this toaster has you covered.

With a unique flip design, you can choose between two cooking options. Use it vertically for toasting or flip it down horizontally to grill, bake, and more.

In Toaster mode, the long, wide slot easily fits artisan bread or two bagel halves. There are seven different settings so everyone can choose their ideal toast shade. Plus, the dedicated bagel mode automatically toasts each half to perfection using a higher temperature. The result is a golden outside and a soft inside every time.

Or, choose Grill mode to create classic cheese on toast, sandwiches, and crispy-filled paninis with a golden finish. The three temperature settings give you total control too while the included Bake Tray converts the slot into a closed oven. What’s more, the clever panini accessory makes it simple to create perfectly toasted paninis with those café-style griddle markings you know and love.

Ninja Style

Enjoy even, edge-to-edge toasting in the ST200UK. Not just for breakfast, you can choose from cheese and ham croissants, brunch muffins, pizza bagels, quesadillas, and even fish finger sandwiches and loaded potato waffles – the choice is endless.

Choose your ideal setting using the easy-to-use digital control panel and built in timer. There are seven cooking functions available, toast, bagel, defrost, grill, panini, bake and reheat, so there’ll be something for the whole family to enjoy.

Want to sneak a peek? During cooking, you can remove the Bake Tray to check on your food. The timer will pause until you reinsert the tray. And, there’s no need to worry about any mess with Total Crumb Control. This model features a specially designed crumb tray that will catch any stray debris even in both cooking positions.

With its contemporary matte design, this sleek black toaster makes a stylish addition to any kitchen. You’ll even find a chef-created recipe guide included in the box to get you started.



Ninja, ST200UK, 3-in-1, 2 Slice Toaster, - Grill, and Panini Press, - Black,

products.body_html:
Ninja KT201UK 1.7 Litres Jug Kettle - Stainless Steel

Introducing the Ninja Perfect Temperature Kettle: A Stylish and High-Performance Appliance

Experience the ultimate combination of style and functionality with the Perfect Temperature kettle by Ninja. This exceptional kettle not only boasts a striking design but also delivers outstanding performance, ensuring a flawless cup of tea every time.

Take full control over your hot beverages with this premium Ninja kettle. Its variable temperature settings allow you to customize your drinks according to your preferences, seamlessly blending contemporary aesthetics with impressive capabilities.

Did you know that the temperature at which you brew your hot beverages can significantly impact their flavor? With the KT200UK kettle, you gain access to six pre-set temperature options, ranging from 60° to 100°C, enabling you to unlock the full potential of your favorite drinks. Simply press a button to select your desired temperature:

  • 60 - 90°C: Perfect for brewing specialty teas like Green, White, and Oolong.
  • 95°C: Ideal for French Press and Instant Coffee.
  • 100°C: Optimal for Black, English Breakfast, Earl Grey tea, Hot Chocolate, Chai, Instant Soup, Fruit, and Herbal teas.

If you prefer more precise control, the KT200UK allows manual temperature adjustment in 5°C increments, ranging from 40 to 100°C. Its live readout provides real-time temperature information, ensuring you achieve the perfect brew every single time.

Thanks to its powerful 3000W heating element, the Rapid Boil feature of the KT201UK allows you to boil a cup of water in under 50 seconds. Furthermore, this kettle can maintain your selected water temperature for up to 30 minutes, accommodating both busy mornings and leisurely moments of relaxation.

The Ninja KT201UK kettle is not only functional but also showcases an elegant jug design with a sleek stainless steel finish. Its generous 1.7L capacity ensures there's plenty of boiled water for the whole family to enjoy their favorite hot beverages.

Designed with convenience in mind, the KT201UK features a handy water window with blue illumination and markings, making it effortless to fill the kettle to your desired level while providing visibility of the water quantity. The digital control panel automatically enters sleep mode after five minutes of inactivity, promoting energy efficiency. Moreover, the kettle is BPA-free and equipped with a removable spout filter for easy cleaning and maintenance.

products.body_html:
Ninja 10 - in - 1 Multifunction Oven DT200UK - Black

Cooking a wide range of delicious meals for your entire family has never been easier with the Ninja 10-in-1 Multifunction Oven. This innovative countertop oven guarantees fast, convenient, and crispy results no matter what you decide to prepare.

Discover Ninja's Culinary Excellence Effortlessly create all your favorite recipes with the DT200UK model from Ninja. Boasting a generous 29 L capacity, this oven evenly cooks complete meals on two levels simultaneously. Say goodbye to the need for multiple appliances as you can now cook a main course and a side dish at once. From simple cheese on toast to succulent roast chicken, this multifunctional oven caters to all your taste preferences.

Experience True Surround Convection Technology, which combines rear heat and surround airflow to circulate superheated air throughout the entire oven. Enjoy consistently crisp and evenly cooked results on both racks without the hassle of rotating or flipping your food.

Save Valuable Time with Lightning-Fast Performance Up to 40% faster than a conventional fan oven, the Ninja DT200UK allows you to prepare family-sized meals in as little as 30 minutes. Furthermore, its super-quick 90-second preheating time means you won't have to endure any unnecessary waiting around for the oven to reach the desired temperature.

Unlock Endless Culinary Possibilities Indulge in a wide array of meal options with the DT200UK and its 10 customizable cooking functions, all within a single kitchen appliance. These functions include:

  1. Air Fry - Enjoy your favorite fried foods with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods.
  2. Roast - Ideal for oven traybake meals like chicken breasts and salmon fillets.
  3. Whole Roast - Cook your roast thoroughly without the need for rotation. Prepare roast beef and vegetables simultaneously or roast a larger joint by itself. This model even accommodates a 5.4kg turkey.
  4. Grill - Achieve even grilling results for kebab skewers or achieve a perfectly melted cheese topping on your nachos.
  5. Bake - Create delectable cookies, cakes, and pastries with ease.
  6. Pizza - A dedicated setting for cooking frozen or homemade pizzas to perfection.
  7. Toast/Bagel - Utilize the built-in shade selector to toast up to eight slices of bread or bagel halves to your desired level of crispness.

Select your desired cooking function effortlessly using the user-friendly touch screen controls and digital display. The controls are conveniently located on the oven handle and freeze when the door is open, preventing any accidental adjustments.

Complete Package for Culinary Success The multifunction oven comes complete with essential accessories, including one air fry basket, a roast tray, an oven tray, two wire racks, and a removable crumb tray. Additionally, a chef-created recipe guide is included in the box, allowing you to dive right into culinary adventures from the moment you unpack your Ninja 10-in-1 Multifunction Oven.

products.title: Ninja ZEROSTICK Stainless Steel 5-Piece Pan Set C65000UK
products.body_html:
Ninja ZEROSTICK Stainless Steel 5-Piece Pan Set C65000UK

Discover the perfect blend of style and functionality with the Ninja ZEROSTICK Stainless Steel 5-Piece Pan Set - C65000UK. Engineered for excellence, this cookware set combines the durability of polished stainless steel with the superior heat distribution of an aluminum core, ensuring even cooking and exceptional high-heat searing.

Unmatched Durability and Non-Stick Performance

Ninja's ZEROSTICK non-stick technology is designed to withstand the rigors of high-heat cooking. Unlike traditional non-stick surfaces, it won't chip, flake, or peel, and it's dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. The scratch-resistant surface is safe for use with metal utensils, making it a versatile addition to any kitchen.

Advanced ZEROSTICK Technology

Crafted at an extraordinary 17,000°C, the ZEROSTICK surface fuses plasma ceramic particles with the pan's surface, creating a robust, textured surface that interlocks with Ninja's exclusive coating. This results in an incredibly durable non-stick surface that allows for cooking with little to no oil, making your meals healthier and ensuring food slides easily from pan to plate. Plus, it's free from PFOA, lead, and cadmium.

Key Features of the Ninja ZEROSTICK 5-Piece Set

  • Variety of Pan Sizes: Includes 16cm, 18cm, and 20cm stainless steel saucepans, a 14cm milk pan, and a 24cm frying pan, providing versatility for all your cooking needs.
  • Convenient Glass Lids: Each saucepan comes with a glass lid featuring a stainless steel trim and steam vent, allowing you to monitor your cooking without lifting the lid.
  • Ergonomic Cast Stainless-Steel Handles: Designed for comfort and ease of handling.
  • Dishwasher Safe: Effortless cleaning after every use.
  • Oven Safe to 260°C: Perfect for stovetop-to-oven recipes.
  • Scratch-Resistant and Metal Utensil Safe: Durable non-stick surface that stands up to daily use.
  • PFOA, Lead, and Cadmium Free: Safe for your health and the environment.
  • Compatible with All Hobs: Suitable for all hob types, including induction, ensuring versatile use in any kitchen.

Optimal Induction Cooking Tips

For the best performance on induction hobs, ensure the base of your pan matches the hob ring size:

  • Milk Pan: Ideal for a 12cm induction ring.
  • 16cm Saucepan: Best on a 13cm ring.
  • 18cm Saucepan: Optimal on a 15cm ring.
  • 20cm Saucepan: Perfect for a 17cm ring.
  • 24cm Frying Pan: Suited for a 17.75cm ring.

To maximize efficiency:

  • Ensure the pan base covers the hob ring without being smaller.
  • Use pans with a flat base.
  • Avoid lifting the pan continuously from the hob.
  • Allow extra heating time for coated and aluminum pans with steel bases.

Elevate your culinary skills with the Ninja ZEROSTICK Stainless Steel 5-Piece Pan Set - C65000UK, where durability meets exceptional non-stick performance for an unparalleled cooking experience.

products.title: Ninja OG701UK Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill
products.body_html:
Ninja OG701UK Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill

Transform Your Outdoor Cooking with the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK

Take your grilling experience to the next level with the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK. Whether you're searing steaks, smoking brisket, or air frying crispy sides, this versatile Ninja outdoor grill is designed to deliver 100% authentic woodfire flavors with the convenience of electric power.

Effortless, Electric-Powered BBQ

Forget the hassle of traditional BBQs—no charcoal, no propane, just plug in and start grilling! The Ninja Woodfire BBQ is ready whenever you are, delivering smoky, flavorful food in the time it takes for a charcoal grill to preheat. Enjoy mess-free outdoor cooking, any day of the week.

Authentic BBQ Grilling

Experience the perfect sear and authentic chargrilled taste with the Ninja BBQ. From juicy burgers and sausages to gourmet meals like sticky ribs, beef brisket, spatchcock chicken, and whole salmon fillets, this grill reaches a sizzling 260°C for true BBQ perfection.

Grill with the lid open for an authentic flame-grilled experience or close it for effortless, even cooking—ideal for thick cuts of meat and frozen foods. The advanced heating elements and convection fan ensure consistent results every time.

Integrated BBQ Smoker for Rich Woodfire Flavours

The built-in smoker box uses premium wood pellets to infuse your food with deep, natural smoky flavors. Whether you’re slow-smoking ribs or adding a hint of smokiness to grilled veggies, the Ninja Woodfire BBQ ensures restaurant-quality results in every bite.

Outdoor Air Fryer & Multi-Function Cooking

Enjoy up to 75% less fat than traditional frying with the outdoor air fryer function. With seven customizable cooking modes—including Air Fry, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate—you can prepare a variety of dishes beyond just grilling.

Crispy air-fried chips, baked potatoes, caramelized pineapple, and even grilled peaches—this Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK makes it easy to cook full meals outdoors with incredible woodfire flavors.

Innovative Woodfire Technology

Powered by electricity and enhanced by real wood pellets, this Ninja outdoor grill features an integrated smoker box that infuses any cooking function with rich, smoky taste. Choose from two signature pellet blends: Robust Blend for meats and All-Purpose Blend for fish and vegetables. A starter pack of both blends is included, with additional Ninja Woodfire Pellets available for purchase.

Feed a Crowd with Ease

The spacious 28cm x 37cm grill plate accommodates up to 8 burgers, 16 sausages, 2 racks of ribs, or a 2kg pork shoulder. The air frying basket can hold up to 1kg of wings or 1.5kg of hand-cut wedges. From quick weeknight meals to weekend feasts, the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK is your go-to for effortless outdoor cooking.

Grill Anywhere, Anytime

No gas or charcoal needed! The electric-powered Ninja Woodfire BBQ is safe to use on patios, balconies, campsites, and other outdoor spaces. With a 1.6m power cord for flexibility, you can enjoy BBQ grilling wherever you like.

Weather-Resistant Durability

Built to withstand the elements, this Ninja outdoor grill is designed for year-round cooking with a durable, water-resistant exterior (IPX4-rated).

Easy to Use & Clean

The non-stick grill plate and removable grease tray make cleanup a breeze. Plus, get inspired with the included chef-created recipe guide.

Elevate Your BBQ Game with the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK

Enjoy the convenience of electric grilling with the rich, authentic flavors of woodfire cooking. Whether you’re a BBQ enthusiast or a casual cook, the Ninja Woodfire Electric BBQ Grill & Smoker OG701UK is the ultimate addition to your outdoor kitchen.
